461120.name: Astro Lords: Experienced Warrior
461120.description:
This package will help you in battle.
Get a bonus to your characteristics in battle with the new "Skillful Warrior" offer


The package includes officers that increase the damage, shield and durability of the ship or starbase in battle, as well as reduce the energy consumption and the rate of recovery of the ship's energy in battle. They can be applied not only to the captains, but also to the starbase.

DLC "Artful Warrior" includes:

Officers:
  • "John Smith" Silver Maximum and minimum laser damage + 10%, Maximum and minimum missile damage + 10%
    "Peter Streltsov" Silver Ship shield + 15%, Minibot reserve on the ship + 10%, Ship or Starbase durability in battle + 10%
    "Sergei Petrov" Silver Energy consumption of the origins of the green and blue sectors -15%, The rate of recovery of the ship's energy in battle + 15%

Contracts:
  • 3 "Contracts" for 1 month

How to use the DLC:
  • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game
  • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor window, select it and press the button: Collect the reward
  • Enjoy your DLC!

Attention, important!

In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.
461120.supported_languages:
俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
